page.title: 15CHILDREN'S TOYS EMSWORTH
page.content: {Boys under the age of nine}are Transformers which are model robots that when you twist and turn,they change into cars,planes,etc.{A Team {and He Man}are moveable figures of TV characters.{Toy cars}are model replicas of real cars with moving parts,ie.boot,bonnet,door,etc. The two main companies are{Matchbox and Corgi. They range in size from 5cm to 3ocm in length they cost from 70p to 10 pounds. {Girls under the age of nine}like to play with{My Little Pony}which you can buy a comb and a stable for.They cost about 4 pounds.Girls also like{Sindy {and Barbie}dolls which you can buy accessories for.They cost around 10 poundsin the shops.
